059C64AB.Callback5Header: Speak with Ksenia inside the fort

0871A46B.Toast: A crusader seeks to rid the Zakarum Fortress of evil.

1F9943DA.Callback13Header: Join Ksenia inside the Sealed Quarters

D53BFF05.Phase0Description:
I met a Zakarum crusader named Ksenia. She believes that we can purify the Zakarum Fortress, returning it to its previous glory.

I should meet her inside the fort.

F4A9EC5A.Phase14Description: Mephisto's influence has corrupted this once great fortress. Ksenia and I should continue forward to discover how to undo his corruption.
